bill_title: provide for historical snowmobile license plates.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for historical snowmobile license plates. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-5 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any person who is a resident of this state and the owner of a snowmobile which is more than thirty years old at the time of applying for registration of the snowmobile, may apply directly to the secretary for a set of license plates to be described as historical snowmobile license plates in lieu of the application provided for in §§ 32-5-9.1. The plates shall be issued to the applicant instead of the usual license plates after payment of a ten dollar registration fee. The license plates shall be permanent for the life of the snowmobile. Any snowmobile for which historical snowmobile license plates have been issued may only be used for special occasions such as, display, parade, exhibitions, tours, and similar uses. Fees collected under the provisions of this section shall be credited to the state motor vehicle fund. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
